Posts.Content: I can respond to the second part of your message - about Arimidex.  I've been taking it for over 2 years.  After surgery/radiation in 2004, I  entered  an Arimidex study at Johns Hopkins.  Since completing the study, I've been taking it every day.  Fortunately, no side effects, and no recurrence.
Posts.Title: Hi Everyone - New here
